org.grouplens.lenskit.basic

Class AbstractGlobalItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractGlobalItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlobalItemScorer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ItemItemGlobalScorer

    public abstract class AbstractGlobalItemScorer
extends java.lang.Object
implements GlobalItemScorer

    Base class to make global item scorers easier to implement. Delegates single=item score methods to collection-based ones,

      • globalScore

        public double globalScore(@Nonnull
                 java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems,
                 long item)

        Score a single item based on a collection of items(a shopping basket).

        Delegate to globalScore(Collection, Collection).

        Specified by:
        globalScore in interface GlobalItemScorer
        Parameters:
        queryItems - The objective items ID used as the query
        item - The item ID to score.
        Returns:
        The preference, or Double.NaN if no preference can be predicted.

      • globalScore

        @Nonnull
public MutableSparseVector globalScore(@Nonnull
                                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
        Description copied from interface: GlobalItemScorer

        Score a collection of items based on a collection of items(a shopping basket).

        Specified by:
        globalScore in interface GlobalItemScorer
        Parameters:
        queryItems - The objective items ID used as the query
        items - The list of items to score.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to predicted preference. This mapping may not contain all requested items.
